                               .:.Plot.:.                         

                                                                  

         A fat Lawyer finds himself growing "Thinner" when        

         an old gypsy man places a hex on him. Now the            

       lawyer must call upon his friends in organized          

      crime to help him persuade the gypsy to lift             

      the curse. Time is running out for the desperate          

      lawyer as he draws closer to his own death,              

      and grows ever thinner.
